HOME.my-webpage: and this is my website in the form of a technology demo.
HOME.repository: The full application code is available at:
HOME.tools: To build this site, I used:

FORM.component-desc-desktop: A dynamic form built from various Angular Material components. On the right side there is a live preview of the form model.
FORM.component-desc-mobile: A dynamic form built from various Angular Material components. At the bottom of the page there is a live preview of the form model.
FORM.name: Name
FORM.age-hint: If the cat is not yet a year old, enter 0.
FORM.invalid-age: Date of birth does not match the entered age
FORM.beauty-error: The beauty of the cat must not be less than 5

LIST.component-desc: A list implementation that combines two solutions: "infinity", i.e. constantly adding more elements to the list data source, and "virtuality", i.e. dynamically adding and removing list elements from the document structure. This allows even the largest lists to load quickly and remain responsive.
LIST.hello: Welcome to the infinite hotel. Please select a room:

GRID.component-desc: AG Grid table implementation with sorting, filtering and paging. Ability to resize and reorder columns. Automatic storage of grid state. Export option to CSV file.
GRID.name: Name

MODEL_3D.component-desc: Interactive 3D model viewer built with Three.js library. Features include loading different GLB models, automatic model rotation, adjustable lighting intensity, controlling the camera (orbit controls), and support for model animations.
